actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that, in the case of entitlement periods beginning after June 30, 1973, the one-third of the funds under such Act which would go to the State governments shall be returned to the general fund of the Treasury.

summary.text: Provides, under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972, that in the case of entitlement periods beginning after June 30, 1973 for programs under such Act, one-third of the funds which would go to the State governments shall be returned to the general fund of the Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that, in the case of entitlement periods beginning after June 30, 1973, the one-third of the funds under such Act which would go to the State governments shall be returned to the general fund of the Treasury.
